item.title: Using rvest to scrape National Occupation Codes
item.description: At work, I’m always looking for a list of National Occupation Codes and their descriptions. I realized I can probably scrape this information faster than I can find it on my team’s network drive thanks to rvest and the tidyverse. Libraries: library(tidyverse) # make tidy library(rvest) # scrape data library(knitr) # make a table Read in the appropriate list of NOCs: nocs <- read_html("http://noc.esdc.gc.ca/English/NOC/QuickSearch.aspx?ver=16&val65=*") Parse the HTML into a list then a file:
